pullRequest.title: Fix some regex, finals and replace isPresent with ifPresent
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Title and also fixed a type. NUMBER_SEPERATOR -> NUMBER_SEPARATOR.
Changes

Fix some useless escapes in regex
Change the ,|\\. to a simple [,.]
Fixed typo
Added some finals
Changed if (isPresent) execute() to a simple ifPresent(execute())

Related Issues
N/A
Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message: Fix some regex, finals and replace isPresent with ifPresent

nodes.bodyText:
This will break the regex though, wouldn't it?
Since . must be escaped otherwise it is treated as a wildcard for any character...
Same here, wouldn't . be treated as a wildcard?
